title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced feature flags: Faster releases and rapid recovery (DEV320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高级功能标志：更快发布和快速恢复 (DEV320)
abstract: Feature flags have evolved beyond simple on/off switches for software releases. This code-focused session demonstrates advanced feature flagging techniques through real implementation examples and production code samples. See how Amazon leverages feature flags at scale using AWS AppConfig, with detailed code walkthroughs that showcase powerful use cases beyond basic feature releases. The session includes practical code examples for accelerating releases and reducing mean time to recovery (MTTR), enabling attendees to implement these patterns in their own tech stacks immediately.
abstract_cn: 功能标志已经超越了软件发布的简单开关功能。这个以代码为重点的会议通过真实的实现示例和生产代码样本演示了高级功能标志技术。了解 Amazon 如何使用 AWS AppConfig 大规模利用功能标志，通过详细的代码演练展示超越基本功能发布的强大用例。会议包括加速发布和减少平均恢复时间 (MTTR) 的实用代码示例，使与会者能够立即在自己的技术栈中实现这些模式。

presenter.name: Steve Rice
presenter.title: General Manager, AWS AppConfig & Parameter Store
